attributes.additional_details: This act is aimed to target minority and ethnic groups to prevent them from legally voting in their own country against one of the most unpopular governments in UK history. This clearly goes against the equality act as u18 can't use travel cards as photo ID however over 65 can use it.
attributes.background: Immediately repeal the Election act. As photo ID is expensive and sometimes unavailable for some. They shouldn't be discriminated for no reason.
